name: 邱德威
objective: 探討有關無機物質的化學性質、原子結構及化學反應。討論在材料及礦物上之應用。
schedule:
CH1. Introduction
CH2. Atomic Structure
CH3. Simple Bonding Theory
CH4. Symetry and Group Theory
CH5. Molecular Orbitals
CH6. Coordination Chemistry
CH7. Organometallics
scorePolicy:
期中考 30%
報告 30%
期末考 40%
materials: Inorganic Chemistry 3rd Ed. Gary L. Miessler, Donald A. Tarr
